conbody.p: The native client requires an active and valid license to be installed on the GemFire servers for full functionality. The product download includes a three server evaluation license that allows you to run up to three clients for each server. To move into development and production, you purchase licenses for your cache servers with add-on licensing for your clients. The add-on licensing covers either a specific number of clients or unlimited client access. For information, contact technical support and see the licensing information in the Java server’s GemFire User’s Guide.
You do not need to install any licenses on the client.
If you have any problems with licensing when you run your GemFire clients, the errors are logged in the server log files.
